mapper.select: select file_num, file_title, file_upload_date, file_size, userid ,views from file where board_num = #{boardNum} order by file_upload_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into file(board_num, file_title, file_content, file_name, file_size, file_content_type, file_data, userid) values(#{boardNum}, #{fileTitle}, #{fileContent}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{fileContentType}, #{fileData}, #{userId})
